title: Synergistic adsorption and photocatalytic degradation of tetracycline using a Z-scheme kaolin/g-C<sub>3</sub>N<sub>4</sub>/MoO<sub>3</sub> nanocomposite: A sustainable approach for water treatment
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 360
